name: holiday frost snowflakes
notes:
add joy to your holidays with these beautiful knit snowflakes. three festive designs to pick from and each one takes only one mini.

experience level

* advanced beginner

materials

* woolstok (worsted) bundle (100% fine highland wool, 21 mini hanks; 5g/12yds): 1 bundle (holiday frost)
* tapestry needle

finished dimensions

* snowflake 1: 4½”
* snowflake 2: 5¼”
* snowflake 3: 5”

color shown

* storm cloud no. 1301
* thermal spring no. 1318
* october sky no. 1305
* spring ice no. 1320
* drift wood no. 1312
* highland fleece no. 1303
* grey harbor no. 1304
